arabic_text: ۞ ٱحۡشُرُواْ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ وَأَزۡوَٰجَهُمۡ وَمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡبُدُونَ
translation: (22) [The angels will be ordered], "Gather those who committed wrong, their kinds,[1289] and what they used to worship
footnotes: [1289]- Those similar to them in evil deeds.  Another possible meaning is "their wives."
